pull.title: Revert "contrib: macdeploy: monkey-patch gen-sdk to be deterministic"
pull.body:
This reverts commit ba30a5407e065e9d6dd037351e83f56a43f38f19.

We no-longer support Python 3.8, so remove the monkey patching.
